comments.body: Will it cause problem if catalyst depends on this module and then it has 2 `Platform`?

comments.body:
It would be OK as long as these two are identical.

Or maybe we can move both `Murmur3_x86_32` and `Platform` in spark-sketch to package `o.a.s.util.sketch.unsafe`.
